transcripts.text: Almost 100,000 Americans have died.  37 million Americans have lost their jobs.  And what is Donald Trump concerned about?
But the president is promoting a conspiracy theory about Joe Scarborough, implying he played a sinister role in the death of an aide when he was in Congress 19 years ago.
Her widow would beg me to remove the tweet saying the president of the United States has taken the memory of my dead wife and perverted it for perceived political gain.

Before Trump, did you ever imagine the president could act like this?  Did you ever imagine that the president would promote baseless conspiracy theories?  Did you ever imagine that elected Republicans wouldn't tell him to stop?  In November, it will be time for us to make it stop.
